#AirIndiaParisFlight #AI171 #AI159

#BREAKING: #AirIndia flight AI 159 from #Ahmedabad to #London scheduled to depart at 1:10 PM was cancelled before takeoff due to a #technicalsnag. Over 200 passengers were affected by the #cancellation. Passengers asked to take #refund. AI 159 is the new name given to #AI171  flight.

#Iran   #GlobalDiplomacy #Iran #iranisraelwar #IsraeliranWar #Israel #IranIsraelConflict

#AI171 lifted off at 184 knots. It should have immediately retracted the Gear which would have allowed the plane to accelerate. 

At Vref+60 - around 200 knots airspeed -  Flaps-5 would have been retracted and at 220 knots - Flaps-1 (Slats) retraction.  

This DID NOT HAPPEN! https://t.co/IJk1AUpTsJ
@DGCAIndia why there is no preliminary action taken against @airindia safety management till now when more thean 200 people killed. #AirIndiaFlightCrash #AI171

#AI171 
Last signal received by FR24: @ 08:08:51
Takeoff speed: 174 kts (200 mph/0.055 mps)
Airborne duration: 20 sec (aprox 1.1 mile)
ADS-B transmits: 1/sec (every second)

- Aviation regulator authority said the cockpit gave a mayday call almost immediately after take-off.
- The plane disappears from FR24 at the end of the runway almost immediately after take-off.

What could be the reason for disappearance @flightradar24 ?
a) FR24 has no coverage in that specific area or FR24 did not receive at that particular time due to unknown reason.
b) This #AirIndia #Boeing787Dreamliner stopped transmission after airborne due to transponder or power problem.

6. Veteran pilot Capt. Sumeet Sabharwal sent a MAYDAY call minutes after takeoff

With 8,200 flight hours, he lost contact soon after, First Officer Clive Kundar was assisting!

#AI171 #AirIndiaCrash #Mayday #BreakingNews https://t.co/3NpBy7sgmo

üíî Heartbreaking beyond words.
The tragic crash of Air India Flight AI171 near Ahmedabad has taken over 200 innocent lives. Our thoughts and prayers are with the families of the victims. üïØÔ∏è
#AirIndiaCrash #Ahmedabad #AI171 #Prayers #RIP #IndiaMourns https://t.co/ceFw9uVHEM

Initial ADS-B data from flight #AI171 shows that the aircraft reached a maximum barometric altitude of 625 feet(airport altitude is about 200 feet) and then it started to descend with an vertical speed of -475 feet per minute

#planecrash #AirIndiaPlaneCrash #Boeing787Dreamliner

The photos of the Air India #AI171 crash site show the leading edge flaps (sometimes called slats) deployed meaning the flaps were at least in position 1. 

The airport elevation is 189ft with the density altitude giving a performance equal to being around 3,200 ft. That‚Äôs quite a difference. 

The question for 787-8 pilots, can the aircraft maintain positive climb /w flaps 1, heavy weight, and high density altitude?

Initial ADS-B data from flight #AI171 shows that the aircraft reached a maximum barometric altitude of 625 feet (airport altitude is about 200 feet) and then it started to descend with an vertical speed of -475 feet per minute. https://t.co/98CBIH7jwV

Tragic news: Air India Flight AI-171 crashed post take-off from Ahmedabad, claiming 200+ lives. Vikrant Massey mourns cousin Clive Kunder, First Officer on board. Deepest condolences to all affected. #AirIndia #AI171 #VikrantMassey

#AI171 Crash: A Global Wake-Up Call

An Air India Boeing 787 crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad, killing over 200 people. Only one passenger in seat 11A survived.

Aviation safety isn‚Äôt just a national issue‚Äîit‚Äôs a global red flag. https://t.co/UvyYBHxJio
